name: Tile Vania (David Tan)
description:
Programming Language Used: C#

Game Engine Used: Unity

Team Size: Solo

Role: Designer/Programmer

  • Created a player animator controller and worked with sprite sheets to animate player movement.
  • Programmed an interface between code and animator controller to control animation transition during runtime.
  • Designed levels using Unity's tilemap system.

Controls:

  • "A" to move left
  • "D" to move right
  • "W" to climb ladder
  • Space to jump
